Nov 2nd - Elrection Party!

2004-10-20

BUSSHU v. KERII 2004...

   ...---'---...
  • Tuesday, November the 2nd, 2004
    • 6:30pm - Supper for those that can make it at Forrest's.
    • 8pm - Party at Howell's: acoustic jam, libations, prayers, etc.
    • 9pm - Polls open on the East Coast.
  • Wednesday, the 3rd (Culture Day, national holiday)
    • 7am - Results start coming in (maybe earlier).
      • Pancake breakfast / media fest at Forrest's.
      • Bring your laptop (wireless or wired) to add to the media overload. We'll have NPR, C-Span, BBC, CNN, and other feeds going...
  • 1pm - Celebration, lamentation, and maybe lunch at Taneichi Seaside Park, if it's sunny.
   ---...,...---

And remember, it ain't over til the last vote is cast, counted, contested, recounted, sued over, and sent to the Supreme Court. That's the American way.

- Forrest

PS: If you can't make it to Taneichi you can still join the "media fest of solidarity" via instant messenger (aol, msn, or yahoo).
